borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <p class="MsoNormal">The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing development.<br></p>
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

- DRAWING XXX REV XX DATED XX
- USE [SHIFT]+[ENTER] FOR REGULAR LINE SPACING
- USE [ENTER] FOR LARGER LINE SPACING

No other drawings or documents apply.

<ol style="margin-top:0cm" start="1" type="1">
 </ol><p style="margin-left: 0cm;">The maximum occupancy of
     the building (use, congregation or operations ) shall under no
     circumstance exceed 50 persons inclusive of those staff working within the
     building during the following times:<o:p></o:p></p><ol style="margin-top:0cm" start="1" type="1">
</ol><p class="MsoListParagraph">Within the building:<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph">Monday – Saturday 09:00 until <span style="color:
red">23:00 <o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph">Sunday’s and Public holidays 09:00 until <span style="color:red">23:00<o:p></o:p></span></p><p class="MsoListParagraph"><span style="color:red">&nbsp;</span>The maximum occupancy of the building (use,
congregation or operations ) shall under no circumstance exceed 20 persons
inclusive of those staff working within the building at all other times outside
of part a above.</p><p class="MsoListParagraph"><o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p>The use of the exterior garden shall be restricted
to more than 50 people and only used in conjunction with the use hereby
approved during the following hours: 09:00 until 19:00 at any time.</p><p class="MsoListParagraph">Reason: To safeguard the amenity of adjacent
residents and the area generally.<o:p></o:p></p><p class="MsoListParagraph"><o:p></o:p></p>
description:
RETENTION OF D1 COMMUNITY FACILITY USE AT SITE.
- MINOR INTERNAL ALTERATIONS.
- MINOR ALTERATIONS TO ACCESS ARRANGEMENTS AT THE FRONT OF THE BUILDING TO FACILITATE DISABLED PARKING SPACE AND CYCLE PARKING SPACE.
